God, this guy makes me so proud to be a brazilian! he was extraordinary inside and outside the raceway. Patriot but only in a positive way.

IMPORTANT :

I have seen this movie in the theatre multiple times. 

This is the version you want!  It's the theatrical (shorter) release.

The 3hr version has many extras included but does not flow at all well.  It's as if all the special features and extra interviews from the Blu-ray have been spliced into the film.  It is good for extra info but not to watch as a movie.

Please watch the shorter version first.

Hang on, is this the short or the long version?  I already have the 8.9GB long version.  

I much prefer the theatrical release as it's cut better and is much more a movie to show people that don't know Senna's story. 

Is this the short or long version?  Can anyone confirm?

This is the 2 hour 42 minute version, with the interviews added in. Like the previous user said it is better for extra information but it's poorly edited and doesn't flow well.
